data.name: CompleteRename_message
data.value:
Your are selected the Complete rename options for files/ folder. please enter the Name to rename files/folders.
Note : Entered name will added with incrementing numbers base on based on your selection of asending/ desending.
Example : entered name = "Sonic" File/Folder name will be "Sonic-1", Sonic-2, Sonic-3, etc

data.name: CustomMessage_2
data.value:
Please Enter the Number of your choice to prefix to file name.
Example if you enter 00 , then first file name added with the prefix "00"-to your existing file Name , second will be "01-filename". Note: filename= your existing file names, and file extenisons which are untouched.

data.name: CustomMessage_2_Suffix
data.value:
Please Enter the Number of your choice to add Suffix to file name.
Example if you enter 00 , Then first file name added with Suffix "Existing Filename-00" second file name will be "Existing Filename-01".
Note: filename= your existing file names, and file extenisons which are untouched.

data.name: CustomMessage_3
data.value:
Please Enter Name/charchaters of your choice in first text box and Number in second text box.
Example : If you are entered 'Shashi' in first text box '000' in second TextBox , the first file name will be prefixed with Shashi-000-filename. and your second file name will be shashi -001-filename. Note: filename= your existing file names, and file extenisons which are untouched.

data.name: CustomMessage_3_Suffix
data.value:
Please Enter Name/charchaters of your choice in first text box and Number in second text box.
Example : If you are entered 'Shashi' in first text box '000' in second TextBox , the first file name will be Suffix with " Existing filename- Shashi-000 " second file name will be "Existing filename- shashi -001"
Note: filename= your existing file names, and file extenisons which are untouched.

data.name: CustomMessage_4
data.value:
Your choose to enter constant prefix with all your file name , Please Enter Name/charchaters of your choice in the Textbox.
Example : If you are entered 'Shashi' in text box All of your files are prefixed with Shashi-filename. Note: filename= your existing file names, and file extenisons which are untouched.

data.name: CustomMessage_4_Suffix
data.value:
You are choosen to enter constant suffix with all your file name , Please Enter Name/charchaters of your choice in the Textbox.
Example : If you are entered 'Shashi' in text box All of your files are Suffix with "Existing filename-Shashi". Note: filename= your existing file names, and file extenisons which are untouched.

data.name: Failure
data.value: Failure Rename of all FIles/Folders are not possible for failure reasons Please checkn the Result column.

data.name: FolderPrefix1
data.value:
"You are selected the Auto number Increment options to Prefix with Folders name.
Example: First Folder name added with the prefix "00" to your Existing Folder Name. Second Folder will "01 Existing Folder Name". Note: Folder name= your existing Folder names, which are untouched."

data.name: FolderPrefix2
data.value:
Please Enter the Number of your choice to add Prefix to Folder.
Example if you enter 00 , Then first Folder is added with Prefix "00-Existing Folder Name" second Folder name will be "01-Existing Folder Name".
Note: Folder Name = your existing Folder names, which are untouched.

data.name: FolderPrefix_3
data.value:
Please Enter Name/charchaters of your choice in first text box and Number in second text box.
Example : If you are entered 'Shashi' in first text box '000' in second TextBox , the first Folder name will be Prefix with "Shashi-000-Existing Folder name" second Folder name will be "Shashi-001-Existing Folder name"
Note: Folder Name = your existing Folder names, which are untouched.

data.name: FolderPrefix_4
data.value:
You are choosen to enter constant Prefix with all your Folder name , Please Enter Name/charchaters of your choice in the Textbox.
Example : If you are entered 'Shashi' in text box All of your Folders are Prefix with "Shashi-Existing Folder name ".
Note: Folder Name = your existing Folder names, which are untouched.

data.name: FolderSuffix1
data.value:
You are selected the Auto number Increment options to Suffix with Folders name.
Example: First Folder name added with the Suffix "00" to your Existing Folder Name-00". Second Folder will "Existing Folder Name-01". Note: Folder name= your existing Folder names, which are untouched.

data.name: FolderSuffix2
data.value:
Please Enter the Number of your choice to add Suffix to Folder.
Example if you enter 00 , Then first Folder is added with Suffix "Existing Folder Name -00" second Folder name will be "Existing Folder Name-01".
Note: Folder Name = your existing Folder names, which are untouched.

data.name: FolderSuffix_3
data.value:
Please Enter Name/charchaters of your choice in first text box and Number in second text box.
Example : If you are entered 'Shashi' in first text box '000' in second TextBox , the first Folder name will be Suffix with " Existing Folder name-Shashi-000 " second Folder name will be "Existing Folder name-shashi -001"
Note: Folder Name = your existing Folder names, which are untouched.

data.name: FolderSuffix_4
data.value:
You are choosen to enter constant suffix with all your Folder name , Please Enter Name/charchaters of your choice in the Textbox.
Example : If you are entered 'Shashi' in text box All of your Folders are Suffix with "Existing Folder name -Shashi".
Note: Folder Name = your existing Folder names, which are untouched.

data.name: Please_Sel_GridItems
data.value:
Please Select the Files/Folders you want to rename.
By selecting the check box in each row or else Please check Select All check Box in the Grid.

data.name: PrefixMessage
data.value:
You are selected the Auto number Increment options to prefix with file name.
Example: First file name added with the prefix "00"-to your existing file Name , second will be 01-filename. Note: filename= your existing file names, and file extenisons which are untouched.

data.name: Start_Rename
data.value:
Renaming Process starts Now, Based on your choice the selected Items are Rename in #0# order.
Note: Once this Process starts Dont click on other options in this App, if you do, you gone a loose the existing Rename Process.

data.name: Success
data.value: Rename Process is completed successfull. More info see Result column in grid.

data.name: SuffixMessage
data.value:
You are selected the Auto number Increment options to Suffix with file name.
Example: First file name added with the Suffix "00" to your Existing file Name-00". Second file will "Existing file Name-01". Note: filename= your existing file names, and file extenisons which are untouched.
